about_the_game:
A flying journey :


Mesoké offers an aerial, contemplative and poetic journey in which you will be led to discover mysteries and unique places by flying freely in a universe with marked and colorful atmospheres.

Help Mesoké find his peace and memories:

By crossing many singular environments you will discover the resources, memories and objects necessary for the evolution of the world as well as the continuation of the journey towards the inner kingdom of Mesoké.

Features :

  • Enjoyable, smooth, intuitive and satisfying flight gameplay. Feeling of lightness, freedom and ease.

  • Original scalable HUB system by exploring and collecting resources.

  • A singular universe and dreamlike forming a web of tangled worlds. Like a labyrinth of paintings  who tells a story without words.

  • Risk/Reward System : Challenge, tension, precision and difficulty essentially depend on your choice and taking risk.

  • Mix of Flying genre, adventure and emotion without known equivalent. Sensation spectrum from calming contemplation to the tension of speed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or higher, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or higher (minimum 2 GB dedicated VRAM GDDR5)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Mesoké is a solo flying, adventure and exploration game in a poetic universe metaphorizing a dive into our inner world. The freedom to travel while flying and taking risks are the keys to discovering this universe, its secrets and the resources necessary to make it evolve.
